oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Mary Le Sueur, 1976 August 11, excerpt 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Mary Le Sueur, conducted on 11 August 1976 by Jane King as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Tennessee Centennial Project. Le Sueur compares the Centennial with Opryland. The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Le Sueur, Mary Hughes, 1886-1981--Interviews
